title: Loot
body: Is it just me or can anyone else not re-roll champ shards or skin shards, nor can i disenchant in essence.. Just wondering if its a bug or something you cant do no more??.. help??

replies.body: That sounds like an usual case, but it can happen if a connection problem is failing to process the transaction to our server.  Just to be sure, try out each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to clear any instability or blocks reaching us.  Let me know if that helps!
